text:
Just posted some updates to the CMS CLI, local development tooling in <#CLJJXGTC0|local-development> <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/CLJJXGTC0/p1577993373028300>

Get started by following <https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/tools/local-development>

purpose:

For the latest news subscribe to our Developer Changelog.
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/changelog>
